explanation: [0-0] A woman with black hair, wearing a grey top, pink pants, and an orange shawl, is standing by the road drinking water. She is holding a brown bag. There is a tree behind her.

[0-9] At this moment, an elderly man wearing grey clothes and white pants runs over and snatches her bag. The black-haired woman stares at him blankly. The scene changes to the black-haired woman reaching out and saying something, while the elderly man continues running. The scene changes again to a man wearing camouflage clothing and blue pants, carrying a treasure chest, who sees the situation. The scene changes back to the black-haired woman chasing the elderly man.
